short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage your Chrome tabs efficiently with a dedicated mini tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The One Tab to Rule Them All. Were always improving please send me any new features or bugs!
export feature and share webpage feature to share tabs
This extension streamlines your browsing experience by allowing you to group, manage, and restore tabs effortlessly. Save your tabs as collections, close and reopen them with a click, and share them as web pages. With features like searching tabs across groups, copying links to the clipboard, and group-based tab management, this tool offers a simple yet powerful way to stay organized and focused. Whether you're saving tabs for later or decluttering your browser in real time, this extension ensures your browsing remains efficient and clutter-free.
